page.title: 05Playtime Entertainment
page.content: Skipping is a{game}usually played by girls only.Football is a team game,played with a ball and only boys {play}it.Hotrice is a game played with a small ball.Girls usually play on their own and so do boys.All you have to do to play this game is to stand in a circle, with your legs open.Drop the{ball }in the middle of the circle.Who ever's legs it goes through they are on.They have to try to hit someone with the ball and then they are on with that person.Conkers is played in Autunm, girls and boys play this game.Catching and running is a game played by boys and girls.A lot of girls play throwing a small ball against the wall but sometimes boys play this game aswell.
